steps.name: Go to 'Men's Jeans' section and close adverts modal, if appears
move to 'Men's' section
click on 'Jeans' inside 'Men's' section with waiting for presence ofd element
check if there is a modal layer with shadow root and close it
on 'Men's Jeans' page scroll to second item, click on it, wait for url and close adverts modal, if appears
get url of second item from 'Men's Jeans' page
scroll to second item, move cursor to it and click
wait for second item's url
check if there is a modal layer with shadow root and close it
pick size, add item to bag, go to cart and wait for it's url
scroll to 'Size' button and click on it
click on first size option inside 'Size' dropdown
click on 'Add to Bag' button
check that 'Added to Bag' modal is visible
click on 'View Bag' button
wait for url
get info about sub total, shipping cost, item's name, free shipping progress
scroll to item's info section
get text of shipping message
get shipping progress bar value
get shipping progress bar status
get text of max value cost for free shipping
get added to cart item's name
get added to cart item's sale price
get added to cart item's quantity
get sub total value
get shipping price
parse string that contains digits into int
scroll to 'Edit' button and click on it
check that 'Edit Item' modal is visible
get text of modal's title
increase amount of item, get new quantity, update item and wait for changes
